text: - Clibrain is a technological startup
devoted to create
generative AI for Spanish.
The challenges of creating this company
was creating a technology
that speaks Spanish for generative AI.
We are using AWS as a partner

because we don't want to
go on this path alone.
We need a partner to get trust
and also to be able and to be aware

of the innovations that
are coming in the market.

We are using AWS for
several parts of the model.

We are using SageMaker for
the machine learning stuff.
We are also using A100 NVIDIA GPUs
for training the models.
And we have tested in Trainium.

In order to train the models
that we are launching,
like Lince or Lince Zero,
or the fine tuning on Llama 2,

which are the models that
we have recently launched.
And we are using also AWS for inference.

We are using inference
and AV100 from NVIDIA.
We want to be testers for Bedrock
and we are already on the waiting list.

We wanted to be with the
first class technology

and we know that AWS
is the best technology
that we can use to train model,
to work on AI and also to scale.
We are using AWS Cloud
because we have plans to grow very fast
in several places at the same time.

The way with AWS, for me,
is not only a relationship
from a customer and a provider,
it's a relationship for partnership.
We are exploring together anywhere
that it's changing every day.
